Fields.Name: Which Clone
Fields.ToolTip: 1-4 for which of the clones this is. No effect on anything besides the 'Clone' behavior type.

Fields.Name: Sight Range (Tens)
Fields.ToolTip:
The fight won't start until the player is within this number times ten units of where Phantom Ganon was placed.
Note that this only affects the range on the X/Z plane. Phantom Ganon does not check difference in height between himself and the player, and will trigger the fight even if the player is very far above or below him.

Fields.Name: Disable Spawn on Death Switch
Fields.ToolTip: Only works for the 'Forsaken Fortress' and 'After Light Arrows' behavior types.

Fields.Name: Fight in Progress Switch
Fields.ToolTip: He will set this switch when the fight starts and unset it when he's defeated.
